<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> that injects an MI thunk that is used to lower indirect calls in a way that prevents speculation on some x86 processors and can be used to mitigate security vulnerabilities due to targeted speculative execution and side channels such as CVE-2017-5715. <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86indirectthunks-cpp/#details">More...</a>
